thread.title: The xx Share New Song “Say Something Loving”
thread.title_full: The xx Share New Song “Say Something Loving”

author: Jake Boyer
title: The xx Share New Song “Say Something Loving”
text:
The xx will release their highly-anticipated new album I See You , their third full-length, next week. Now, as a special little New Year’s treat, they have shared a song from the upcoming work titled “Say Something Loving.” Listen to it below via Spotify:

This is the second single from I See You following the critically-acclaimed “On Hold” which dropped in November. In the time since, they performed that song (along with some quaintly clunky choreography) for their debut performance on Saturday Night Live .
I See You marks the first full-length from the band since their 2011 album Coexist . However, all three band members reunited on In Colour , 2015’s excellent solo album from their chief musical meister Jamie xx.
Look out for I See You to drop next Friday, January 13, via Young Turks.
Revisit the gorgeous music video for I See You ‘s lead single “On Hold” below.

In other music news, Lil Uzi Vert has shared a wile, anime-inspired music video for his single from last year “Ps & Qs.” Watch it right here .
